answerText: Bowman's capsule[10] These capillaries, which are located in the medulla of the kidney, branch off from efferent arterioles. They are essential for countercurrent exchange within the kidney.

subject: Science
question: Question: Its visceral layer is comprised of podocytes, whose foot processes form one layer of the filtration barrier. For 10 points each: [10] Name this part of the nephron that collects fluid from the glomerulus.
